title: Basik Techno Experience
description: I want you to have the best study session of your life. Tune in to experience the best tracks currently rocking underground clubs in Berlin, Detroit and Chicago. Perfect vibes to study in the library with headphones, or if you feel like dancing, dim the lights and raise the speakers. I want to show people the inner workings of underground EDM. Time to bury Guetta and Avicii. Underground is in the house! All the shows will be remixed live, no pre-recordings and no Spotify playlists. This is the real deal.
